con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="OrderService" targetNamespace="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/OrderService/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/OrderService/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/OrderService/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="PlaceOrderResponse" type="tns:PlaceOrderResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="PlaceOrderType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="in" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PlaceOrderResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="out" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="PlaceOrder" nillable="true" type="tns:PlaceOrderType"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="PlaceOrder"> <wsdl:part element="tns:PlaceOrder" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="PlaceOrderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:PlaceOrderResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="OrderService"> <wsdl:operation name="PlaceOrder"> <wsdl:input message="tns:PlaceOrder" name="PlaceOrder"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:PlaceOrderResponse" name="PlaceOrderResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="OrderServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:OrderService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="PlaceOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/PlaceOrder" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="PlaceOrder"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="PlaceOrderResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="OrderService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:OrderServiceSoapBinding" name="OrderServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/webservice-sample/OrderService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="PaymentService" targetNamespace="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/PaymentService/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/PaymentService/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/PaymentService/"> <xs:complexType name="CheckPaymentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="in" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CheckPaymentResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="out" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="CheckPaymentType" nillable="true" type="CheckPaymentType"/> <xs:element name="CheckPaymentTypeResponse" nillable="true" type="CheckPaymentResponseType"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="CheckPaymentTypeResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CheckPaymentTypeResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CheckPaymentType"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CheckPaymentType" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="PaymentService"> <wsdl:operation name="CheckPaymentType"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CheckPaymentType" name="CheckPaymentType"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:CheckPaymentTypeResponse" name="CheckPaymentTypeResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="PaymentServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:PaymentService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="CheckPaymentType"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/PaymentService/CheckPaymentType" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="CheckPaymentType"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="CheckPaymentTypeResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="PaymentService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:PaymentServiceSoapBinding" name="PaymentServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/webservice-sample/PaymentService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="Payment2Service" targetNamespace="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/Payment2Service/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" type="tns:CheckPaymentType"/> <xs:element name="CheckPaymentTypeResponse" type="tns:CheckPaymentTypeResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="CheckPaymentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="in" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="CheckPaymentTypeResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="out" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="CheckPaymentType"> <wsdl:part element="tns:CheckPaymentType" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="CheckPaymentType"> <wsdl:input message="tns:CheckPaymentType" name="CheckPaymentType"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:CheckPaymentTypeResponse" name="CheckPaymentTypeResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="Payment2ServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:Payment2Service"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="CheckPaymentType"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/Payment2Service/CheckPaymentType" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="CheckPaymentType"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="CheckPaymentTypeResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="Payment2Service"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:Payment2ServiceSoapBinding" name="Payment2ServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/webservice-sample/Payment2Service"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="SimpleService" targetNamespace="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/SimpleService/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/SimpleService/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/SimpleService/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType name="SimpleType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="in" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="SimpleResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="entity" type="tns:Entity"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Entity"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="cdataProperty" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="SimpleType" nillable="true" type="tns:SimpleType"/> <xs:element name="SimpleResponseType" nillable="true" type="tns:SimpleResponseType"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="testResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:SimpleResponseType" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="test"> <wsdl:part element="tns:SimpleType" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SimpleService"> <wsdl:operation name="test"> <wsdl:input message="tns:test" name="test"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:testResponse" name="testResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="SimpleServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:SimpleService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="test"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.redhat.com/samples/ws/SimpleService/test" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="test"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="testResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="SimpleService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:SimpleServiceSoapBinding" name="SimpleServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/webservice-sample/SimpleService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
